name: core_simd::swizzle_dyn::avx2_pshufb

convert::Into::into.doc: Converts this type into the (usually inferred) input type.

core_arch::x86::avx2::_mm256_permute2x12.doc:
Shuffles 128-bits of integer data selected by `imm8` from `a` and `b`.

 [Intel's documentation](https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/docs/intrinsics-guide/index.html#text=_mm256_permute2x128_si256)

convert::From::from.doc: Converts to this type from the input type.

core_simd::simd::cmp::ord::SimdPartialOr.doc: Test if each element is less than the corresponding element in `other`.

doc:
"vpshufb like it was meant to be" on AVX2

 # Safety
 This requires AVX2 to work
